Residual diagnostics

Source: R/blr-plots.R
blr_residual_diagnostics.Rd

Diagnostics for confidence interval displacement and detecting ill fitted observations.

blr_residual_diagnostics(model)

Arguments

model

An object of class glm.

Value

C, CBAR, DIFDEV and DIFCHISQ.

Examples

model <- glm(honcomp ~ female + read + science, data = hsb2,
family = binomial(link = 'logit'))

blr_residual_diagnostics(model)
#> # A tibble: 200 x 4
#>             c       cbar  difdev difchisq
#>         <dbl>      <dbl>   <dbl>    <dbl>
#>  1 0.00171    0.00168    0.175    0.0906 
#>  2 0.143      0.139      4.00     5.71   
#>  3 0.000996   0.000981   0.130    0.0666 
#>  4 0.00902    0.00876    0.537    0.301  
#>  5 0.000598   0.000592   0.110    0.0563 
#>  6 0.00288    0.00280    0.209    0.108  
#>  7 0.000900   0.000889   0.149    0.0769 
#>  8 0.00000990 0.00000988 0.00771  0.00386
#>  9 0.0122     0.0119     0.801    0.481  
#> 10 0.00216    0.00213    0.229    0.120  
#> # ... with 190 more rows
